info.title: debug_traceTransaction example
info.description: This API example demonstrates how to use the debug_traceTransaction method to retrieve a detailed execution  trace of a transaction, identified by the transaction's hash.

200.description: Detailed execution trace of the specified transaction

structLogs.description: An array of execution steps (opcodes) taken by the transaction.

gas.description: The gas provided by the transaction.

returnValue.description: The return value of the transaction, if any.

gasUsed.description: The total gas used by the transaction.

result.description: The detailed execution trace of the transaction.
